response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of craftsmanship and excellence. Given its significance, I believe it deserves a home where it can be appreciated fully. Considering its rarity and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. I trust this offer will allow us to explore the potential for a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 750000}
